articles.title: 5 Android phones you should buy instead of the Google Pixel 10 Pro - Android Authority
articles.description: The Google Pixel 10 Pro is a really, really good phone. But before you buy it, here are five other Android phones that may be a better fit.

articles.title: Huawei’s second trifold adds stylus support and purple pleather - The Verge
articles.description: The Huawei Mate XTs arrives in China for $2,500 — before Samsung has even announced its first trifold.

articles.title: Meet Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Series: Packing Everything You Expect From a Premium Tablet - Samsung Newsroom
articles.description: Galaxy Tab S11 series delivers the latest Galaxy AI features and a more powerful Samsung DeX experience — thin and light tablets designed for effortless productivity

articles.title: Inside Philips Hue’s plans to make all your lights motion sensors - The Verge
articles.description: With a firmware upgrade and the new Bridge Pro, your Hue lighting system gets a “magical” new feature.
